title: An Act relative to investments by entities of the Commonwealth

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Kerans of Danvers, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1221) of Sally P. Kerans and Sal N. DiDomenico relative to investments by entities of the Commonwealth.  Financial Services.
